/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the city's daily life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars of different makes and models are scattered along the road, indicating a busy time of day. The trees lining the street add a touch of green to the scene, contrasting with the concrete structures. In the distance, mountains rise against the sky, adding depth and a sense of scale to the image.
